plot: Three teams - representing the police, the military and the rescue services - compete against each other in difficult and physically straining missions for the grand prize, a trip to New York to meet their American counterparts.
title: Kova laji
plot_es: Three teams - representing the police, the military and the rescue services - compete against each other in difficult and physically straining missions for the grand prize, a trip to New York to meet their American counterparts.
